This is the homepage for MSSC 6250 - Statistical Machine Learning by [Dr. Mehdi Maadooliat](www.mssc.mu.edu/~mehdi) in Spring 2026 at Marquette University. All course materials will be posted on this site.

You can find the course syllabus [here](/course-syllabus.html) and the course schedule [here](/).
